mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_thesis tt where 1 = 1

select tt.thesis_sn , tt.lang_code , tt.thesis_sj , tt.jrnl , tt.link_url , tt.regist_year , tt.regist_mt , tt.regist_dt , tt.register_sn , ( select user_nm from tb_user where user_sn = tt.register_sn ) register_nm , tt.updt_dt , tt.updusr_sn , ( select user_nm from tb_user where user_sn = tt.updusr_sn ) updusr_nm from tb_thesis tt where 1 = 1
order by tt.regist_dt desc, tt.thesis_sn desc
order by tt.thesis_sn desc

select tt.thesis_sn , tt.lang_code , tt.thesis_sj , tt.jrnl , tt.link_url , tt.regist_year , tt.regist_mt , tt.regist_dt , tt.register_sn , ( select user_nm from tb_user where user_sn = tt.register_sn ) register_nm , tt.updt_dt , tt.updusr_sn , ( select user_nm from tb_user where user_sn = tt.updusr_sn ) updusr_nm from tb_thesis tt where tt.thesis_sn = #{thesisSn}
